mapper.sql: ID, USER_OID, LOGIN_OID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, NAME, FAIL_NUM, LOCK_STATUS, IS_ABLE, IS_DELETE, LOCK_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, PASSWORD_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_sys_login
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_login
ID,
USER_OID,
LOGIN_OID,
ACCOUNT,
PASSWORD,
NAME,
FAIL_NUM,
LOCK_STATUS,
IS_ABLE,
IS_DELETE,
LOCK_DATE,
MODIFY_DATE,

#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_sys_login
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_OID = #{record.userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_OID = #{record.loginOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT = #{record.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAIL_NUM = #{record.failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCK_STATUS = #{record.lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ABLE = #{record.isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCK_DATE = #{record.lockDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_sys_login set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_OID = #{record.userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_OID = #{record.loginOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{record.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAIL_NUM = #{record.failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCK_STATUS = #{record.lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ABLE = #{record.isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCK_DATE = #{record.lockDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update t_sys_login
USER_OID = #{userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_OID = #{loginOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAIL_NUM = #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCK_STATUS = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ABLE = #{isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCK_DATE = #{lockDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_sys_login set USER_OID = #{userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_OID = #{loginOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAIL_NUM = #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCK_STATUS = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ABLE = #{isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCK_DATE = #{lockDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PASSWORD_DATE = #{passwordDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select syslogin.ID as id ,syslogin.LOGIN_OID as loginOid, syslogin.USER_OID as userOid, syslogin.ACCOUNT as account,syslogin.LOCK_STATUS lockStatus, syslogin.IS_ABLE as isAble,usr.NAME as userName,d.DISTRICT_OID as districtOid, d.name as districtName ,o.ORGAN_OID as organOid,o.name as organName from t_sys_login syslogin LEFT JOIN t_sys_user usr ON syslogin.USER_OID =usr.USER_OID and usr.IS_DELETE='0' LEFT JOIN t_sys_district d ON d.DISTRICT_OID = usr.DISTRICT_OID and d.IS_DELETE='0' LEFT JOIN t_sys_organ o ON o.ORGAN_OID = usr.ORGAN_OID and o.IS_DELETE='0' where syslogin.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by syslogin.id desc
